sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-dialog :visible.sync="visible" :title="title" width="640px">
        <el-form :model="ruleForm" :rules="rules" ref="ruleForm" label-width="150px" class="demo-ruleForm">
            <el-form-item label="username" prop="username">
                <el-input v-model="ruleForm.username" placeholder="please enter a username"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="securityAsk" prop="question">
                <el-select v-model="ruleForm.question" placeholder="choose a securityAsk">
                    <el-option v-for="item in options" :key="item.value" :label="item.label" :value="item.value">
                    </el-option>
                </el-select>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item label="securityAns" prop="securityAns">
                <el-input v-model="ruleForm.securityAns" placeholder="please enter the securityAns of securityAsk"></el-input>
            </el-form-item>
            <el-form-item>
                <el-button type="primary" @click="submitForm('ruleForm')">OK</el-button>
            </el-form-item>
        </el-form>
    </el-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';
import { EventBus } from '@/utils/event-bus';

export default {
    data() {
        return {
            visible: false,
            title: 'Forgot password',
            ruleForm: {
                username: '',
                securityAsk: '',
                securityAns: '',
            },
            rules: {
                username: [
                    { required: true, message: 'please enter a username', trigger: 'blur' },
                    { min: 1, max: 7, message: '1-7 letters', trigger: 'blur' }
                ],
                securityAns: [
                    { required: true, message: 'please enter the security ans', trigger: 'blur' },
                ],
            }
        };
    },
    methods: {
        show() {
            this.visible = true;
            this.resetForm('ruleForm');
        },
        hide() {
            this.visible = false;
        },
        goToChangePasswordDialog(){
            this.hide();
            EventBus.$emit('show-change-password-dialog');
        },

        async submitForm(formName) {
            this.$refs[formName].validate((valid) => {
                if (valid) {
                  let form = {
                    username: this.ruleForm.username,
                    password: this.ruleForm.password,
                    verification: this.ruleForm.verification,
                  }
                  request.post('/log/login', form)
                      .then((response) => {
                        if (response.data.code === 1) {
                          // 请求成功
                          console.log('请求成功:', response.data.msg);
                          console.log('jwt:', response.data.data);
                          localStorage.setItem('jwt', response.data.data);
                          localStorage.setItem('username', this.ruleForm.username);
                          EventBus.$emit('is-logged-in');
                          this.hide();
                        } else if (response.data.code === 0) {
                          // 请求失败
                          console.error('请求失败:', response.data.msg);
                          alert(response.data.msg);
                        } else {
                          // 未知的响应码
                          console.error('未知的响应码:', response.data.code, response.data.msg);
                        }
                      })
                      .catch((error) => {
                        console.error(error);
                      })
                } else {
                    console.log('不合法的表单');
                    return false;
                }
            });
        },
        resetForm(formName) {
            this.$refs[formName].resetFields();
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
.el-row {
    margin-bottom: 20px;

    &:last-child {
        margin-bottom: 0;
    }
}

.el-col {
    border-radius: 4px;
}

.bg-purple-dark {
    background: #99a9bf;
}

.bg-purple {
    background: #d3dce6;
}

.bg-purple-light {
    background: #e5e9f2;
}

.grid-content {
    border-radius: 4px;
    min-height: 36px;
}

.row-bg {
    padding: 10px 0;
    background-color: #f9fafc;
}
</style>
